data.name: XEL Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Experience XEL's atmospheric soundtrack, featuring 22 lovingly crafted tracks from the Indie action-adventure hit.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Storage: 146 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
